content:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication Namespace

Definition

In this Article

Classes

ServiceEndpointCollection

This class represents the endpoints of a Reliable service. Each endpoint has a listener name and the address of that listener.
ServiceException

Provides an information about an exception from the service. This exception is thrown when the actual exception from the service cannot be serialized for transferring to client.
